docs.title: Xentis' Steel Compendium
docs.text:
The Steel Compendium is an independent product published under the DRAW STEEL Creator License and is not affiliated with MCDM Productions, LLC. DRAW STEEL © 2024 MCDM Productions, LLC.

  • This Compendium is unofficial
  • There is no warranty written or implied

Welcome to Xentis' Steel Compendium, a suite of tools and resources for MCDM's Draw Steel TTRPG.

docs.title: Draw Steel Rules
docs.text: Rules for MCDM's Draw Steel TTPRG can be found in the Compendium

docs.title: Obsidian Plugin
docs.text:
Obsidian is a markdown note-taking tool that can be very helpful for TTRPG prep and play.

The Draw Steel Elements Plugin is designed to help support the game. Details can be found in the Draw Steel Elements Documentation
